Article Title: Edtech startup Unacademy lays off 250 employees in latest round of job cuts
Article Text:
What the company said

Edtech startup , Unacademy is facing fresh turbulence, with reports indicating the company has laid off 250 employees across various departments. This comes just weeks after the departure of its co-founder and CTO, Hemesh Singh.As reported by The Economic Times, the fresh round of layoffs has impacted around 150 employees from the sales function who were unable to meet targets.The remaining 100 belonged to various other departments within the company. While Unacademy has confirmed the restructuring exercise, they haven't disclosed the exact number of employees affected.‚ÄúAs part of our ongoing efforts to streamline operations and enhance business efficiency, we have recently undergone a restructuring exercise. This was necessary keeping in mind the company‚Äôs goals and vision for the year, as we focus all our efforts on sustainable growth and profitability. Consequently, some roles have been impacted,‚Äù the company said in a statement.This is the third round of layoffs conducted at Unacademy. Previously, the company let go of roughly 12% of its workforce (around 380 employees) in March 2023, and in April 2022, it downsized by approximately 1,000 employees including both contract and full-time staff.These layoffs mark the continuation of a trend plaguing the Indian edtech industry. In 2022, several major players, including Byju's and Vedantu, witnessed significant workforce reductions as the post-pandemic boom in online learning subsided. Unacademy itself had conducted layoffs earlier in 2023, and its medical entrance exam preparation platform PrepLadder also underwent a round of job cuts in May 2024.
Article Summary: Unacademy has laid off 250 employees across various departments. This comes just weeks after the departure of its co-founder and CTO, Hemesh Singh. The company has confirmed the restructuring exercise, but hasn't disclosed the number of employees affected.

Article Title: Global IndiaAI Summit 2024 starts today: 7 key focus points of the 2-day event
Article Text:
Union IT minister Ashwini Vaishnaw to inaugurate Global IndiaAI Summit 2024

Key pillars and focus of the IndiaAI Mission

Infrastructure:

Innovation:

Data access:

Real-world applications:

Education and workforce:

Startup growth:

Ethical considerations:

The Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY) is hosting the ‚ÄòGlobal IndiaAI Summit 2024 ‚Äô starting today (July 3). The two-day event aims to discuss key issues related to artificial intelligence (AI) and will be attended by international delegates, AI experts and policymakers.The event, to take place in the National Capital, will focus on advancing AI development in areas like compute capacity, foundational models, datasets, application development, future skills, startup financing, and safe AI.‚ÄúThe summit will provide a platform for leading international AI experts from science, industry, civil society, governments, international organisations, and academia to share insights on key AI issues and challenges. The event underscores the Government of India‚Äôs dedication to the responsible advancement of AI, fostering collaboration and knowledge exchange among global AI stakeholders,‚Äù the ministry said.‚ÄúThrough the Global IndiaAI Summit 2024, India aspires to establish itself as a global leader in AI innovation, ensuring that AI benefits are accessible to all and contribute to the nation's socio-economic development,‚Äù it added.As the lead chair of the Global Partnership on Artificial Intelligence (GPAI), India will convene global AI experts to discuss key issues and promote trustworthy AI.Union IT minister Ashwini Vaishnaw will inaugurate the event, and Jitin Prasad, minister of state for electronics and IT will also be speaking at the inauguration.While on the first day, there will be a diverse array of sessions designed to delve deep into critical aspects of AI application and governance, the second day will feature sessions dedicated to nurturing talent and scaling AI innovations.The Global IndiaAI Summit 2024 covers a wide range of areas to foster a strong and responsible AI ecosystem in India.IndiaAI Compute Capacity to build a robust and scalable AI infrastructure with high-powered computing resources such as over 10,000 GPUs through public-private partnerships and an AI marketplace, making it easier for researchers and developers to access the tools they need.IndiaAI Innovation Centre to focus on creating powerful AI models, or large language models (LLMs) tailored to India's specific needs, ensuring these models are effective for various industries.The IndiaAI Datasets Platform to remove hurdles for accessing high-quality data ‚Äì a crucial element for training and developing strong AI models.IndiaAI Application Development Initiative to bridge the gap between AI research and real-world problems. It aims to create practical AI solutions that benefit society and the economy.IndiaAI FutureSkills to recognise the importance of a skilled workforce. By expanding AI education and establishing Data and AI Labs in Tier 2 and 3 cities, it aims to ensure a future generation equipped with the necessary AI expertise.IndiaAI Startup Financing to offer financial support to nurture promising AI startups. This injects capital into the ecosystem, fostering innovation and economic development.Safe & Trusted AI to prioritise responsible AI development and promote ethical practices, create tools for transparent AI, and establish guidelines for trustworthy AI technologies.
Article Summary: The two-day event aims to discuss key issues related to artificial intelligence (AI) It will be attended by international delegates, AI experts and policymakers. It will focus on advancing AI development in areas like compute capacity, foundational models, application development, future skills, startup financing, and safe AI.

Article Title: Google Maps to soon make travelling in group easier with friends and family
Article Text: Google Maps is set to change the way people travel in groups with a new feature, aimed at making co-navigation seamless for multiple drivers. This new functionality, as revealed by a patent uncovered by Igilta and David Kowalski (xleaks7 on X), will allow several vehicles to navigate together in real time, even if they start from different locations.Currently, Google Maps offers navigation and other details to users for single vehicles.However, group travel , especially with different vehicles becomes an issue and harder for people to coordinate. The new co-navigation feature promises to address these complexities. It will streamline the process for friends or families traveling in separate vehicles to a common destination by providing real-time coordination and updates.Key aspects of this feature include the ability to send notifications, share vehicle locations , and suggest optimal meeting points where routes converge. This ensures that all drivers are synchronized, reducing the chances of getting lost or delayed. Furthermore, the system will relay the latest traffic and road conditions, based on the leading vehicle's route, keeping everyone informed.Though currently just a patent, this co-navigation feature holds significant promise for enhancing group travel efficiency and convenience. It reflects Google's ongoing commitment to enhancing user experience through innovative functionalities in Google Maps. While the exact launch date remains unknown, the potential benefits of this feature make it a highly anticipated addition to the Google Maps suite.
Article Summary: Google Maps is set to add a new co-navigation feature. This feature will allow several vehicles to navigate together in real time. It will streamline the process for friends or families traveling in separate vehicles to a common destination by providing real-time coordination and updates.

Article Title: AI-powered fintech platform Olyv reports 76% growth in business
Article Text: Olyv, Indian digital financial platform powered by AI, has announced its performance for FY 2024. Formerly known as SmartCoin, Olyv achieved profitability with a revenue of over INR 250 crore and a remarkable 76% growth in business volume.By offering a diverse suite of products, including micro-savings, credit health management, and insurance, Olyv has attracted 26 lakh monthly active users, a staggering 80% increase compared to the previous fiscal year.Olyv's AI/ML models and risk-based loan pricing, coupled with in-house collections platform, have enabled them to tap into a burgeoning market segment. This segment, valued at a potential $300 billion, comprises digital-savvy, non-carded, and underbanked Indians, including self-employed individuals, blue/grey collar workers, and salaried professionals. To date, the company has secured ~$25 million in equity and ~$80 million in debt funding, a testament to their vision and execution capabilities.‚ÄúOur journey to profitability represents a culmination of years of hard work, innovation, and dedication to our vision of making affordable and democratized financial products," says Rohit Garg, Co-Founder & CEO of Olyv.
Article Summary: Olyv, Indian digital financial platform powered by AI, has announced its performance for FY 2024. Formerly known as SmartCoin, Olyv achieved profitability with a revenue of over INR 250 crore and a remarkable 76% growth in business volume. To date, the company has secured ~$25 million in equity and ~$80 million in debt funding.

Article Title: Why users in some countries are not able to update their Netflix subscription
Article Text:
Netflix plans available for subscribers after July 13

Why Netflix increases plan prices

Netflix , in January, announced its plans to retire its cheapest ad-free plans in countries where it's available. A new report has said that the company has started the process to phase out its ‚ÄúBasic‚Äù plan, notifying users about the date on which their current subscription is expiring.According to a report by The Verge, several existing subscribers in Canada and the UK have received notifications urging them to choose a new plan by July 13.Reddit users shared screenshots of the notification, confirming the change.‚ÄúYour last day to watch Netflix is July 13. Choose a new plan to keep watching,‚Äù the notification reads.‚ÄúYour Basic plan has been discontinued, but you can easily switch to a new one. Plans start at just $5.99 with upgraded features,‚Äù it adds, and Netflix provides a button to allow users to ‚ÄúChoose a New Plan.‚ÄùPreviously, Netflix had stopped offering the Basic plan to new subscribers in the US, Canada, and UK in 2023. However, existing users continued to have access.Now, with the phase-out, subscribers will be able to choose from these three options:Ad-supported tier: $6.99/month with commercialsStandard ad-free tier: $15.49/month (previously standard price)Premium ad-free tier: $22.99/month with 4K streamingRecently, Netflix co-CEO Greg Peters explained that price increases for ad-free plans allow the streaming giant to invest in developing a wider variety of features and content, ultimately offering consumers more choice and value.‚Äú[T]hey want a higher diversity of shows, they want more quality shows, so that's our job. If we do that well, we'll go back and occasionally ask members to pay a little bit more to keep that flywheel running,‚Äù Peters said.It is to be noted that Netflix plan prices will remain unchanged in India, however, the company expanded password sharing curbs in the country in 2023. In India, Netflix subscription prices range from Rs 149 to Rs 649 per month.
Article Summary: Netflix has started the process to phase out its "Basic" plan. Subscribers in Canada and the UK have received notifications urging them to choose a new plan by July 13. Previously, Netflix had stopped offering the Basic plan to new subscribers in the US, Canada, and UK in 2023.

Article Title: Spotify is testing this new feature that it may be 'unsure' of what it will do
Article Text:
What the company has to say about the test



How emergency alerts will work in Spotify



How this feature will help Spotify compete with Google and Meta



Spotify is venturing beyond music with a new test feature: emergency alerts . The popular music streaming platform is well known for its library of audio content. This pilot program, currently running only in Sweden , explores the possibility of governments and disaster relief authorities using the app to broadcast important public announcements .According to a report by TechCrunch, the code discovered within the Spotify app suggests that the system will be able to deliver updates on critical situations such as ‚Äúaccidents, serious events or disruptions of important services.‚ÄùSpotify has also confirmed the test's existence, however, the company hasn't disclosed its motivations for offering this service.Currently, there's no legal requirement for them to do so in Sweden, but the company emphasises that it's simply exploring the app's potential for emergency alerts.In a statement shared with TechCrunch, the company mentioned that the feature was only being tested in Sweden.‚ÄúAt Spotify, we routinely conduct a number of tests in an effort to improve our user experience. Some of those tests end up paving the way for our broader user experience while most serve only as an important learning,‚Äù a Spotify spokesperson said.This feature was discovered by Chris Messina , a tech expert specialising in uncovering hidden functionalities. Messina speculates that emergency alerts could incentivise users to enable app notifications, a function commonly disabled for non-essential apps like those in entertainment or social media. This will allow Spotify to grab user attention more effectively and promote new features.The code discovered within Spotify's app offers further clues and includes phrases like -- "Emergency alerts in Sweden," "Receive public emergency alerts," and references to the Swedish public alert system ("Important public announcement, IPA") -- all pointing towards this functionality. The code also includes a prompt to "Visit the Swedish Civil Contingencies Agency site for more information."Beyond immediate notifications, integrating emergency alerts could imporve Spotify's status from an entertainment app to a more essential tool.This move may position the music streaming platform as a competitor to Meta 's "Safety Check" feature, a popular tool for disaster updates on social media.Similarly, Google utilises its apps' to warn users of dangers like earthquakes through Android alerts.In the US, legislators have even explored mandating emergency alert support on streaming services alongside traditional broadcasters.
Article Summary: Spotify is testing an emergency alert feature in its app. The pilot program is currently running only in Sweden. It could be used by governments and disaster relief authorities. Spotify hasn't disclosed its motivations for offering this service. This move may position the music streaming platform as a competitor to Meta's "Safety Check" feature.

Article Title: Google now requires advertisers to disclose election ads that are ‚Äòdigitally altered‚Äô
Article Text:
What ads are exempted from this new policy

Deepfakes ahead of Lok Sabha elections in India

Google has announced an update to its advertising policy that will now require advertisers to disclose election ads that use digitally altered content to portray real or realistic-looking people or events. This policy applies to image, video and audio content.Under the updated political content policy disclosure requirements, advertisers must select a checkbox labelled ‚Äúaltered or synthetic content‚Äù when setting up their campaigns.This move is part of their ongoing effort to combat election misinformation .‚ÄúWe believe that users should have information to make informed decisions when viewing election ads that contain synthetic content that has been digitally altered or generated. Accordingly, verified election advertisers in regions where verification is required must prominently disclose when their ads contain synthetic content that inauthentically depicts real or realistic-looking people or events,‚Äù Google said.As per the company, this disclosure must be clear and placed in a location where it is likely to be noticed by users.According to the company, the ads that contain synthetic content altered or generated in such a way that it does not have any significant impact on the claims made in the ad are exempt from these disclosure requirements.‚ÄúThis includes editing techniques such as image resizing, cropping, colour or brightening corrections, defect correction (for example, ‚Äúred eye‚Äù removal), or background edits that do not create realistic depictions of actual events,‚Äù Google said.Earlier this year, fake videos depicting Bollywood actors purportedly criticising the ruling party went viral online. Separately, ChatGPT-maker OpenAI announced in May that the company stopped five covert influence operations attempting to use their AI models for ‚Äúdeceptive activity‚Äù online, aiming to manipulate public opinion or influence political outcomes.Last year, Facebook-parent company Meta implemented a similar policy requiring advertisers to disclose the use of AI or other digital tools to alter or create political, social or election-related content on Facebook and Instagram.
Article Summary: Google has announced an update to its advertising policy that will now require advertisers to disclose election ads that use digitally altered content. This policy applies to image, video and audio content. The ads that contain synthetic content altered or generated in such a way that it does not have any significant impact on the claims made in the ad are exempt from these requirements.

Article Title: Wordle 1108 Puzzle for July 1, 2024: Hints, clues and solution for word of the day
Article Text:
Wordle 1108 Hints and Clues for July 1, 2024

Today‚Äôs word of the day starts with the alphabet A.

There are two vowels in today‚Äôs word of the day.

Vowel A is repeated in today‚Äôs word.

Today‚Äôs word of the day ends with a vowel.

Alphabet D is also present in today‚Äôs word.

Wordle 1108, July 1, 2024: Word of the Day

Wordle, the popular word-guessing game that has taken the world by storm, continues to challenge players with its cryptic puzzles. Whether you‚Äôre a seasoned Wordle aficionado or a newbie trying to crack the code, we‚Äôve got you covered. Let‚Äôs dive into today‚Äôs hints and uncover the elusive answer!Wordle is a daily word game created by Josh Wardle, a Brooklyn-based software engineer.Since its debut in 2021, the word game has gained popularity among users across the globe. Users are greeted with a new word puzzle everyday that can easily be cracked using elimination hints. Each player gets only six chances to solve the puzzle.Today‚Äôs Wordle 1108 promises a puzzle that tests your linguistic skills, likely to be decoded by many participants. Article Summary: Wordle is a daily word game created by Josh Wardle, a Brooklyn-based software engineer. Users are greeted with a new word puzzle everyday that can easily be cracked using elimination hints. Each player gets only six chances to solve the puzzle. Today's Wordle 1108 word is ADAGE.

Article Title: Apple MacBook models with M4 chipsets may come with ‚Äòpaid‚Äô AI features
Article Text:
Apple MacBook models with M4 chipset: Expected availability



Apple MacBook Pro models with M4 chipsets: What to expect



Apple is expected to launch new MacBook Pro and MacBook Air models in the coming months. According to a report by Bloomberg‚Äôs Mark Gurman, the rumoured MacBook Pro and MacBook Air machines are likely to come powered by three variants of Apple‚Äôs M4 chipsets -- the base M4, M4 Pro and M4 Max chipsets. The report also notes that the upgraded MacBooks may retain their predecessor's designs and may even offer new features through an AI subscription service which is expected to boost sales.Rumours suggest that Apple will soon release 14-inch and 16-inch models of MacBook Pros with M4 chips by the end of this year or early next year. Moreover, MacBook Air sizes are also in line for an early 2025 refresh.Currently, the only Apple devices with the M4 chip are the newest iPad Pro models . The most affordable option is the 11-inch iPad Pro with 256GB of storage which was launched at Rs 99,900.Gurman claims that both the MacBook Pro and MacBook Air won't see any design changes despite getting upgraded to the M4 chipsets. This comes after the 2021 redesign of the MacBook Pro with the M1 chip.He also suggested that a more significant visual overhaul might be coming in 2026, potentially coinciding with the adoption of OLED displays similar to the latest iPad Pro models.Similarly, the MacBook Air is also expected to wait until 2027 for a design refresh, five years after it departs from the wedge shape.Gurman acknowledges that a chip upgrade alone might not be enough to entice existing MacBook users to upgrade.To address this, Apple is reportedly considering a monthly subscription service that builds upon the free Apple Intelligence launching this fall.Additionally, Gurman claims Apple might integrate and potentially take a commission on third-party AI services like ChatGPT, mirroring their App Store model.
Article Summary: Apple is expected to launch new MacBook Pro and MacBook Air models in the coming months. The rumoured machines are likely to come powered by three variants of Apple‚Äôs M4 chipsets. The upgraded MacBooks may retain their predecessor's designs and may even offer new features through an AI subscription service.

Article Title: Why Elon Musk ‚Äòflagged‚Äô Kamala Harris‚Äô post on abortion ban in the US
Article Text:
What Elon Musk said on Kamala Harris‚Äô post?



What is Community Notes feature on X?

Tesla CEO Elon Musk slammed an X (formerly Twitter) post of US Vice President Kamala Harris on Donald Trump‚Äôs stance on abortion law in the US. This comes as the presidential debate intensifies between the sitting president Joe Biden and Republican rival Donald Trump . The next US election is scheduled for November this year.In an X post recently, Harris wrote ‚ÄúDonald Trump would ban abortion nationwide.President @JoeBiden and I will do everything in our power to stop him and restore women's reproductive freedom.‚Äù The post was flagged by X‚Äôs Community Notes - the platform‚Äôs fact checking like tool.‚ÄúPresident Trump has repeatedly said he will not sign a national abortion ban ,‚Äù the community notes stated in her post. It also provided supporting links to articles to corroborate the fact.Flagging Harris‚Äô post, Elon Musk wrote ‚ÄúWhen will politicians, or at least the intern who runs their account, learn that lying on this platform doesn‚Äôt work anymore?‚Äù. The tech billionaire also posted a screenshot of her post.As per an X help page, Community Notes aim to create a better informed world by empowering people on X to collaboratively add context to potentially misleading posts. Contributors can leave notes on any post and if enough contributors from different points of view rate that note as helpful, the note will be publicly shown on a post.Community Notes are currently visible to everyone. The help page states that Community Notes do not represent X‚Äôs viewpoint and cannot be edited or modified by its teams.
Article Summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris wrote ‚ÄòDonald Trump would ban abortion nationwide.‚Äô The post was flagged by X‚Äôs Community Notes - the platform‚ÄôS fact checking tool. Elon Musk wrote ‚ÄúWhen will politicians, or at least the intern who runs their account, learn that lying on this platform doesn‚Äôt work anymore?‚Äù

Article Title: iQoo Z9 Lite 5G smartphone to launch in India on July 15: Here‚Äôs what the smartphone may offer
Article Text:
iQoo Z9 Lite confirmed details

iQoo Z9 Lite expected specs and price

iQoo is all set to launch its new Z-series smartphone in India. The Chinese smartphone maker iQoo has confirmed that it will launch the iQoo Z9 Lite smartphone in the country on July 15.The company posted on X (formerly known as Twitter) about the upcoming iQoo launch. ‚ÄúTaking it slow? - no more! A #FullyLoaded5G experience awaits you! #iQOOZ9Lite,‚Äù reads the post.Along with the launch date, iQoo has also shared a teaser image of the upcoming iQoo Z9 Lite smartphone.The company has confirmed that the yet-to-launch iQoo Z9 Lite smartphone will sport a dual rear camera setup. The smartphone will feature a flat rear panel and display. The dual rear camera is placed inside a rectangular module located at the top left corner.The smartphone maker has also confirmed that the iQoo Z9 Lite smartphone will pack an octa-core MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset paired with 6GB of RAM. The smartphone will offer 128GB internal storage.iQoo Z9 Lite is said to sport a 6.56-inch HD+ LCD display which is expected to offer up to 90Hz of refresh rate. The smartphone is tipped to sport a 50MP main camera and a 2MP depth sensor.The smartphone is also rumoured to come equipped with a side-mounted fingerprint sensor and house a 5000 mAh battery with 15W fast charging support.Multiple online rumours suggest that the iQoo Z9 Lite may come with a starting price tag of Rs 10,000.
Article Summary: iQoo is all set to launch its new Z-series smartphone in India. The Chinese smartphone maker has confirmed that it will launch the iQoo Z9 Lite smartphone in the country on July 15. The smartphone is tipped to sport a 50MP main camera and a 2MP depth sensor. It is also rumoured to come equipped with a side-mounted fingerprint sensor.

Article Title: Watch: Amazon founder Jeff Bezos shares his morning routine, starts his first meeting at..
Article Text:
Take a look at Jeff Bezos‚Äô video

Jeff Bezos on his 8-hour sleep

Amazon founder Jeff Bezos is among the world's richest people. A video of the e-commerce ex-CEO is doing rounds on the internet, where Bezos is seen talking about his morning routine and more.In the video, Bezos said ‚ÄúI go to bed early, I wake up early, I like to putter in the morning. I like to read the newspaper, I like to have coffee, I like to have breakfast with my kids before they go to school.My puttering time is very important to me. That's why I set my first meeting for 10 am.‚ÄùThe video was shared by @historyinmemes on X, formerly Twitter on June 30. It has garnered about 4.7million views till now.In the video, Bezos goes on to say that he prefers high IQ meetings before lunch. "Like anything that's really mentally challenging, that's a 10 am meeting. And because by 5 pm, like, I can't think about that today. Let's try this again at 10 tomorrow," the Amazon founder said in the video.During the video, Bezos also stated that he needs eight hours of sleep. "I think better. I have more energy. My mood is better," he added.Bezos has talked about the role of a senior executive in a company. According to him, the job of a senior executive is to ‚Äúmake a small number of high quality decisions‚Äù. ‚ÄúYour job is not to make thousands of decisions everyday,‚Äù he further stated adding that it is not worthy if the quality of decisions is lower because you are tired or grouchy.
Article Summary: A video of the e-commerce ex-CEO is doing rounds on the internet. In the video, Bezos is seen talking about his morning routine and more. The video was shared by @historyinmemes on X, formerly Twitter on June 30. It has garnered about 4.7million views till now.

Article Title: Virat Kohli's this 'Jai Hind post' becomes the 'most-liked' ever on Instagram
Article Text:
Virat Kohli‚Äôs Instagram post

Virat Kohli announced retirement from T20 playing format

Virat Kohli has smashed another record, this time off the field. His celebratory Instagram post following India's T20 World Cup victory has become the most-liked photo ever posted on an Indian account.The emotional post, featuring a collage of Team India celebrating their win, garnered over 19 million likes and counting at the time of writing.Kohli's caption, simply stating "Couldn't have dreamt of a better day than this. God is great and I bow my head in gratitude. We finally did it üáÆüá≥‚ù§Ô∏èüáÆüá≥‚ù§Ô∏èjai hind ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è," resonated deeply with fans across the nation.The previous record for the most-liked Instagram post in India was held by Bollywood couple Kiara Advani and Sidharth Malhotra 's wedding announcement. However, Kohli's post surpassed that record by a significant margin.The comments section of his post was flooded with congratulatory messages from celebrities, athletes, and fans alike. Even international sports stars joined the celebration, with comments from MMA fighter Conor McGregor and Brazilian footballer Vinicius Jr. showering Kohli with praise.Virat Kohli announced his retirement from the T20 International format after leading his team to a thrilling victory in the 2024 T20 World Cup final. "This was my last T20 game playing for India," Kohli declared. "This World Cup was the perfect culmination for this chapter in my career. Time for the next generation to take the T20 game forward."
Article Summary: Virat Kohli has smashed another record, this time off the field. His celebratory Instagram post following India's T20 World Cup victory has become the most-liked photo ever posted on an Indian account. The emotional post, featuring a collage of Team India celebrating their win, garnered over 19 million likes.

Steps to use Indian Bike Driving 3D Cheat Codes

Begin by starting the Indian Bike Driving 3D game on your device.

Look for the button featuring a phone icon, typically located at the bottom left corner of the game screen. Click on this icon to open the phone menu.

Bharti Airtel has announced a price hike across all its prepaid and postpaid plans. Airtel's revised tariff plans will be effective from today, July 3. As announced by the company, it has increased the price of its entry-level plans by 70 paise, 'in order to eliminate any burden on budget challenged consumers.'It must be noted here that while the plans have become costlier, benefits like data, call minutes, etc remain the same.In total, Airtel has increased the price of 15 prepaid and postpaid plans. These prices apply to all circles, including Bharti Hexacom Ltd. Circles. Reliance Jio and Vodafone Idea have also increased their tariff rates by up to 22%.The revised tariff increases the price of Rs 179 monthly plan to Rs 199. The plan will continue to offer 2GB mobile data per day, unlimited calling and 100 SMS per day. Validity of the plan remains 28 days. Similarly, the annual plan of Rs 1,799 offering 2GB mobile data per day, unlimited calling and 100 SMSes every day will now cost Rs 1,999.Airtel's daily data add-on plans now come at Rs 22 onwards (a hike of Rs 3 from the previous Rs 19).Coming to Airtel's postpaid plans, the price now ranges from Rs 449 to Rs 1,199. Daily data plans offering up to 3GB data per day now come with starting price of Rs 265.
Article Summary: Bharti Airtel has increased the price of its monthly plan to Rs 199, offering 2GB data daily, unlimited calling, and 100 SMS per day. The annual plan now costs Rs 1,999 with the same benefits. These changes aim to support budget- constrained consumers while maintaining service quality.

Article Title: Why Anand Mahindra ‚Äòcalled‚Äô ChatGPT after India‚Äôs Cricket World Cup win
Article Text:
Why Anand Mahindra ‚Äòcalled‚Äô ChatGPT

‚ÄúHello Chat GPT 4.O

Please make me a graphic image showing the Indian Cricket team as Superheroes.

Because they were SuperCool till the end.

The greatest gift of this final to India was that it didn‚Äôt come easy. It almost slipped out of their grasp. But they never lost the match in their minds.

Reminding all of us that being a Superhero never comes without a fierce determination to win and a Never Give In attitude.

Jai Ho! #IndiavsSA #T20WorldCupFinal‚Äù reads the post.

Here how users reacted to the post

Team India becomes T20 World Cup 2024 champions

Mahindra Group chairman Anand Mahindra is known for his active social media presence and witty remarks. Following India's dominating victory against South Africa in the T20 World Cup final, Mahindra posted a congratulatory message on X (formerly known as Twitter) with the help of ChatGPT .Mahindra asked ChatGPT 4.0 to create an AI-generated image of the Indian Cricket Team, requesting that the cricketers be depicted as superheroes.Mahindra also shared the ChatGPT-generated image on X. In the image, Team India is depicted as superheroes wearing capes featuring the Indian national flag.Men in Blue secured a thrilling victory in the T20 World Cup 2024 final. After a tense battle against South Africa at the iconic Kensington Oval, India emerged champions with a narrow seven-run win. Virat Kohli's dominant 76 and Rohit Sharma 's sharp captaincy were instrumental in securing the win. Following the game, Virat Kohli also announced his retirement from the T20 format.
Article Summary: Anand Mahindra asked ChatGPT 4.0 to create an AI-generated image of the Indian Cricket Team. In the image, Team India is depicted as superheroes wearing capes featuring the Indian national flag. Men in Blue secured a thrilling victory in the T20 World Cup 2024 final.

Article Title: Shark Tank Judge Anupam Mittal on India semi-final win: Chalo 'yeh bhi' hisaab barabar
Article Text:
Here's what Anupam Mittal wrote on X

How other brands celebrated India's win

India reached the finals of ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 with a thumping victory over England by 68 runs. After losing the toss against England, India scored 171/7 in 20 overs at the Guyana National Stadium. The men in blue all out England in just 16.4 overs, limiting them to 103 runs. India will now play the finals against South Africa on June 29 at Barbados.Like other matches, India's victory over England is being celebrated across the country.Shark Tank judge Anupam Mittal shared his joy over India's win via a post on microblogging platform - X, formerly Twitter.In his post, Mittal wrote "1947 me India se nikala aur 2024 me West Indies se,". Adding further, he said "Chalo üá¨üáß2022 ka bhi hisaab barabar üáÆüá≥üèÜ," pointing at 2022 India's loss against England in the 2022 T20 World Cup semi-final ."don't know about english tea, but english tears are delicious üòÇ #INDvENG," food delivery app Zomato wrote in a X post."Just packing ; Revenge order for Semi-Final in 2022 üò§," Walmart-owned Flipkart wrote. ‚ÄúHitman has once again added hope to the cart üôè," the e-commerce company wrote in another post on X.Quick commerce app Blinkit shared an image of billboard that read "Dear England, if you are thirsty, we can deliver a bo'ah of wo'ah in 10 minutes."
Article Summary: India reached the finals of ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 with a thumping victory over England by 68 runs. The men in blue all out England in just 16.4 overs, limiting them to 103 runs. India will now play the finals against South Africa on June 29 at Barbados.

Article Title: HDFC Bank users, this 'UPI change' is coming starting June 25
Article Text:
Why HDFC Bank is making this change

What is UPI Lite and why banks are pushing it

How to register for email to receive all the UPI transaction alerts



https://instaservices.hdfcbank.com/?journey=107&source_type=103

Starting June 25, HDFC Bank will stop sending text alerts for low-value UPI transactions. This means that HDFC Bank customers will receive SMS alerts for UPI transactions exceeding Rs 100 when sending money and similar notification for when received is above Rs 500. However, the bank will continue to send email alerts for all transactions with no absolutely change.In a mail as well as SMS alert sent to its customers, HDFC Bank said: ‚ÄúStarting from 25th June, 2024: Email Alerts: Continue to receive email alerts for all UPI transactions.SMS Notifications: Now only for transactions above Rs 100 (money sent/paid) and Rs 500 (money received).‚ÄùThis change aligns with banking norms, which require text messages for transactions over Rs 5,000. Despite this, many banks send alerts for lower-value debits as well. HDFC Bank stated that feedback indicated alerts for low-value transactions were deemed 'not useful,' as there is often duplication of notifications from UPI payment apps.Bankers noted that bulk text messages cost between Rs 0.01-0.03 each. With UPI transactions averaging around 40 crores per day, banks collectively spend several crores daily on text message alerts.Banks are also promoting the use of UPI Lite for transactions up to Rs 500. UPI Lite allows a small amount of money to be set aside by the app, facilitating quick payments without the need for second-factor authentication.By reducing the frequency of low-value transaction alerts, HDFC Bank and others aim to streamline notifications for customers while also cutting costs. This shift is expected to enhance the user experience and encourage the adoption of UPI Lite for smaller transactions. However, users can register their email with HDFC bank to receive messages of all the UPI transactionsStep 1: Click onStep 2: Enter the registered mobile numberStep 3: Identify using DoB or PAN or Customer ID and click on "Get OTP."
Article Summary: HDFC Bank will stop sending text alerts for low-value UPI transactions. Bank will continue to send email alerts for all transactions with no absolutely change. This change aligns with banking norms, which require text messages for transactions over Rs 5,000.

Apple iPhone 14 deal: Amazon Pay ICICI Bank Credit Card discount

Holders of the Amazon Pay ICICI credit card can avail an instant flat discount of Rs 2,000 on transactions exceeding Rs 41,940.

Amazon Prime members are eligible for a 5% cashback when using the Amazon Pay ICICI credit card.

iPhone 14 specifications and features

The iPhone 14 represents Apple's latest flagship model, boasting a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR OLED display that showcases vibrant colours and supports HDR content, ensuring an immersive visual experience.

Powered by Apple's A15 Bionic SoC, this smartphone guarantees seamless performance and efficient multitasking capabilities.

Its camera system is versatile, featuring a 12-megapixel wide-angle lens, a secondary 12-megapixel sensor with an ultra-wide-angle lens, and a 12-megapixel TrueDepth front camera, ideal for capturing stunning photos and videos.

The iPhone 14 sports a sleek design, featuring a flat-edge aerospace-grade aluminium frame and Ceramic Shield material on the front panel, providing both durability and aesthetic appeal.

Additionally, it boasts an IP68 dust and water resistance rating, ensuring resilience against environmental elements.

Whether you're looking to upgrade your smartphone or switch to Apple for the first time, the iPhone 14 offers exceptional value for money, combining cutting-edge features with an attractive price point.

Article Title: Apple iPhone 16 Pro Max may offer longer battery life
Article Text:
Apple to use steel battery case to tackle overheating

Apple iPhone 16 series rumours

Apple iPhone 16 series is expected to launch in September and in the run up to the debut, the rumour mill is already churning out scores of leaks. According to another such leak, iPhone 16 Pro Max is expected to get a boost in battery life .Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo has said that the Cupertino-based giant is increasing the energy density of the battery cells of iPhone 16 Pro Max, which will result in longer battery life.‚ÄúMy latest supply chain survey indicates the energy density (Wh/kg) of the battery cells of iPhone 16 Pro Max will increase, which has the benefit of longer battery life with the same battery size or lower battery size with the same battery life,‚Äù he said in a post.However, with increase in energy density of the battery cells, there will be an increase in temperature when running. To tackle this, Apple will use the stainless steel battery case .‚ÄúIncreasing the energy density of the battery cells will increase the battery temperature when running. To avoid overheating the battery, Apple uses the stainless steel battery case for the first time as a thermal solution ,‚Äù Kuo said.While stainless steel may not be as effective as aluminium in dissipating heat, ‚Äúit is more robust and less susceptible to corrosion, so in addition to dissipating heat, the stainless steel battery case provides better protection for the battery and the iPhone system.‚ÄùKuo noted that the use of a stainless steel battery case will reduce the difficulty of removing the battery, hence, helping Apple to ‚Äúcomply with the European Union‚Äôs requirements for mobile phone batteries‚Äô replaceability in the future.‚Äù‚ÄúIf the mass production of this new battery design (upgraded energy density of battery cells & adoption of the stainless steel battery case) goes well and the feedback is favourable, this new battery design will be adopted in all 2H25 new iPhone models,‚Äù Kuo noted.The iPhone 16 series is rumoured to replace physical buttons with touch-sensitive buttons that simulate a press with haptic feedback. The camera layout might shift to a vertical design, unlike the current diagonal setup. The customisable Action button, currently on Pro models, might be available on all iPhone 16 models.Under the hood, the standard iPhone 16 and Plus models might use the A18 chip , while Pro models could get the A18 Pro chip. Meanwhile, the display size for iPhone 16 and Plus (6.1-inch and 6.7-inch) might remain the same, but the refresh rate could improve.
Article Summary: iPhone 16 Pro Max is expected to get a boost in battery life. Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo said that the Cupertino-based giant is increasing the energy density of the battery cells. With increase in energy density, there will be an increase in temperature when running. To tackle this, Apple will use the stainless steel battery case.
